original: 虛空藏菩薩問七佛陀羅尼呪經
analyzed: 虛空藏菩薩問七佛陀羅尼呪經
translated: The Sūtra of the Dhāraṇī Spells of the Seven Buddhas Asked by Bodhisattva Ākāśagarbha
The name of the translator is lost, now attached to the Liang Catalog

original: 如是我聞。一時佛住雞羅莎山。在山頂上諸
analyzed: 如是我聞。一時佛住雞羅莎山。在山頂上諸
translated: Thus have I heard. Once the Buddha was dwelling on Mount Kirī, on the peak
where the gods reside.
Not far from the sages.
He was with a great assembly, surrounded in front and back.
There were five hundred great bhikṣus.
There were also five hundred great bodhisattvas.
Their names were Maitreya Bodhisattva.
Ākāśagarbha Bodhisattva.
Samantabhadra Bodhisattva.
Akṣayamati Bodhisattva.
Mañjuśrī Bodhisattva.

original: 與五百菩薩摩訶薩等皆一生補處。
analyzed: 與五百菩薩摩訶薩等皆一生補處。
translated: Together with five hundred bodhisattva-mahāsattvas, all of whom were in their last lifetime.
At that time the World-Honored One looked in the four directions.
Not far from where he was staying.
He saw in the forest a bhikṣu

original: 為惡鬼所持口出種種惡言。
analyzed: 為惡鬼所持口出種種惡言。
translated: possessed by an evil ghost, speaking various evil words.
In the forest there was also a bhikṣu.
Exposing his body and raising both hands.
Various strange sounds come out of their mouths.
Sometimes they call out to the heavens, and sometimes they cry out to the earth.

original: 爾時虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 爾時虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: At that time, Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Ākāśagarbha,
having heard their voices, received the Buddha's spiritual power.
He adjusted his robes, touched his right knee to the ground,
put his palms together, faced the Buddha, and said to the Buddha,
World-Honored One, why are these two bhikṣus
making such sounds?

original: 或舉於兩手復出惡言音。
analyzed: 或舉於兩手復出惡言音。
translated: They raise their hands and also make evil verbal sounds.

original: 於是世尊告虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩言。
analyzed: 於是世尊告虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩言。
translated: Then the World-Honored One said to Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Ākāśagarbha,

original: 此一比丘為惡病所持出是音聲。
analyzed: 此一比丘為惡病所持出是音聲。
translated: One of these bhikṣus is possessed by an evil illness and makes these sounds.

original: 又一比丘為惡鬼所持露形而走。
analyzed: 又一比丘為惡鬼所持露形而走。
translated: The other bhikṣu is possessed by an evil ghost and runs around naked.

original: 爾時虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 爾時虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: At that time, Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Ākāśagarbha,
said to the Buddha, World-Honored One,
in order to cure all the illnesses of sentient beings,

original: 為除一切惡鬼障難不起故。
analyzed: 為除一切惡鬼障難不起故。
translated: in order to remove all evil ghosts and difficulties,
I only wish that the World-Honored One, for all sentient beings,
would speak the dhāraṇī mantra.
At that time, the World-Honored One manifested his majestic spiritual power.
In the sky, he immediately manifested the six Buddhas.

original: 時釋迦牟尼佛即騰虛空依次而坐。
analyzed: 時釋迦牟尼佛即騰虛空依次而坐。
translated: Then Śākyamuni Buddha rose into the sky and sat in order.

original: 是時大眾悉皆觀見七佛世尊。
analyzed: 是時大眾悉皆觀見七佛世尊。
translated: At that time, the great assembly all saw the seven Buddhas, the World-Honored Ones.

original: 爾時毘婆尸佛為一切眾生故。
analyzed: 爾時毘婆尸佛為一切眾生故。
translated: At that time, Buddha Vipaśyin, for the sake of all sentient beings,
in order to remove all evil ghosts and difficulties,
recited the great majestic dhāraṇī mantra.
He spoke the mantra, saying:

original: 南無佛陀耶　南無達摩耶　南無僧伽耶　南無毘婆尸　多他伽多耶　呵羅呵提三藐三佛陀耶　唵　呵羅呵羅　醯利醯羅耶　南無雞利吉羅耶　閱伽無遮那耶　南無南摩娑波呵爾時毘婆尸佛。
analyzed: 南無佛陀耶　南無達摩耶　南無僧伽耶　南無毘婆尸　多他伽多耶　呵羅呵提三藐三佛陀耶　唵　呵羅呵羅　醯利醯羅耶　南無雞利吉羅耶　閱伽無遮那耶　南無南摩娑波呵爾時毘婆尸佛。
translated: Namo buddhāya, namo dharmāya, namo saṃghāya, namo Vipaśyin, tathāgatāya, arhate, samyak-saṃbuddhāya, oṃ, haro hara, hili hili, namaskṛta jaya, yugma anucchinnāya, namo namaḥ svāhā. At that time, Buddha Vipaśyin

original: 告虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩言。
analyzed: 告虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩言。
translated: told the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Ākāśagarbha:

original: 若有善男子善女人受持此呪者。
analyzed: 若有善男子善女人受持此呪者。
translated: If there are good sons and good women who uphold this mantra,
whether reading or reciting it,
if there are people who seek out this mantra,
if there are those who enjoy hearing it,

original: 是人不為一切刀仗所害。
analyzed: 是人不為一切刀仗所害。
translated: such people will not be harmed by any weapons,
will not drown in any water,
will not be afflicted by any suffering,
will not suffer any untimely death.

original: 若復有人與持此呪人毒藥者。
analyzed: 若復有人與持此呪人毒藥者。
translated: If there are people who give poisoned food to those who uphold this mantra,

original: 其藥變成美食不著於人。
analyzed: 其藥變成美食不著於人。
translated: the poison will transform into delicious food and will not harm them.
If there are people who drink or eat,
first incant it seven times and then eat it.

original: 食已是諸蠱道惡口眾邪。
analyzed: 食已是諸蠱道惡口眾邪。
translated: This will destroy all evil spells, bad mouths, and various heterodoxies,
and they will not be able to cause harm.
If one upholds this mantra,
it will prolong one's lifespan.

original: 所有習誦一聞領悟終不忘失。
analyzed: 所有習誦一聞領悟終不忘失。
translated: Whatever one studies and recites, one will understand it upon hearing it once and will never forget it.
Day and night one will always see the Buddha's image.

original: 若復有人為惡鬼所打不得差者。
analyzed: 若復有人為惡鬼所打不得差者。
translated: If there are people who are struck by evil ghosts and cannot recover,
And in the ear of this person,
Recite the mantra seven times, and the illness will be immediately cured.

original: 若有人患團風白癬及以癲病。
analyzed: 若有人患團風白癬及以癲病。
translated: If there is someone suffering from rheumatism, white leprosy, or epilepsy,

original: 取蘇曼青水香蓮華茴香細辛。
analyzed: 取蘇曼青水香蓮華茴香細辛。
translated: Take sumana blue water incense, lotus flowers, fennel, and ginger,

original: 各以等分取胡麻油煎之。
analyzed: 各以等分取胡麻油煎之。
translated: And take an equal amount of sesame oil to fry them.
Rub the affected area and it will be cured.
All those who are sick,
Use this mantra to recite it, and there will be no one who does not recover.
At that time, Śikhin Buddha was in the sky,

original: 欲為一切眾生除一切病故。
analyzed: 欲為一切眾生除一切病故。
translated: Wishing to remove all illnesses for all sentient beings,
Wishing to remove all evil ghosts and difficulties,
And spoke the mantra, saying:

original: 南無佛陀耶　南無達摩耶　南無僧伽耶　南無尸棄禰多陀伽多耶　阿羅訶提三藐三佛陀　唵　波遮波遮　波遮波耶　薩婆浮多南嗔陀吉羅耶　波邏毘陀南　娑波呵爾時尸棄佛告虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩言。
analyzed: 南無佛陀耶　南無達摩耶　南無僧伽耶　南無尸棄禰多陀伽多耶　阿羅訶提三藐三佛陀　唵　波遮波遮　波遮波耶　薩婆浮多南嗔陀吉羅耶　波邏毘陀南　娑波呵爾時尸棄佛告虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩言。
translated: Namo buddhāya | Namo dharmāya | Namo saṃghāya | Namo śikhinecchattadhagata | Arhato samyaksaṃbuddha | Oṃ pacha pacha | Pacha pāya | Sarva buddha namo dhānya jīvala | Pārapāvitāṃ svāhā At that time, Śikhin Buddha told the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Ākāśagarbha:

original: 我此神呪百千那由他無數億諸佛所說我今說之。
analyzed: 我此神呪百千那由他無數億諸佛所說我今說之。
translated: This divine mantra was spoken by hundreds of thousands of koṭīs of innumerable buddhas. I will now speak it.
For the sake of all sentient beings.
In order to eliminate all illnesses.
In order to eliminate all the obstacles and difficulties caused by evil ghosts.
In order to eliminate all bad dreams.
In order to eliminate all untimely illnesses and deaths.

original: 又告虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩言。
analyzed: 又告虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩言。
translated: He also told the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Ākāśagarbha:
If there are good men and good women,

original: 若晝誦此呪三遍夜誦三遍。
analyzed: 若晝誦此呪三遍夜誦三遍。
translated: who recite this mantra three times during the day and three times at night,
or who keep it in mind, all poisons and spells,
Curses, spells, harsh words, and red tongues,
All kinds of evil spirits will not be able to approach.
In the dark night, always see the Buddhas.

original: 所有食噉之物即自消化而充氣力。
analyzed: 所有食噉之物即自消化而充氣力。
translated: All food and drink will be digested and fill the body with energy.
If that person's life ends,

original: 昏夜所見佛者皆來迎其精神恒相隨逐。
analyzed: 昏夜所見佛者皆來迎其精神恒相隨逐。
translated: The Buddhas seen in the dark night will all come to welcome their spirit and always follow them.

original: 若復有人依此呪法作功能者。
analyzed: 若復有人依此呪法作功能者。
translated: If there are people who rely on this mantra method to perform functions,
For all illnesses, they must tie mantra cords.
If there are people who are seriously ill,
Take sumana wood and fry it in oil.
Rub it on the body and all will be cured.
If there are sentient beings who are afraid day and night,
Take clean water, recite the mantra over it, and sprinkle it in the four directions.
Tie a mantra cord on their body.
All kinds of evil spirits will not be able to take advantage of them.
If a child is beaten by an evil ghost,
Use blue thread to make a mantra cord.
Tie it around their neck and they will be cured.
If there is someone who is struck by an evil ghost,

original: 於耳邊呪作七遍亦得除愈。
analyzed: 於耳邊呪作七遍亦得除愈。
translated: Recite this spell seven times in their ear and they will also be cured.

original: 隨心所欲造者無不得成。
analyzed: 隨心所欲造者無不得成。
translated: Whatever one wishes to create will be accomplished without fail.

original: 爾時毘舍浮佛在虛空中。
analyzed: 爾時毘舍浮佛在虛空中。
translated: At that time, Buddha Viśvabhū was in the sky.

original: 欲為一切眾生除一切病故。
analyzed: 欲為一切眾生除一切病故。
translated: In order to remove all illnesses for all sentient beings,
In order to eliminate all evil ghosts,
In order to prevent obstacles from arising,
He spoke this spell:

original: 南無佛陀耶　南無達摩耶　南無僧伽耶　南無毘舍浮多他竭多耶　阿羅訶提三藐三佛陀耶　唵　伽邏伽邏伽邏伽邏　拘樓拘樓拘樓拘樓　拘盧蹉陀喃　拘樓薩婆伽呵喃　娑波呵爾時毘舍浮佛說此呪已。
analyzed: 南無佛陀耶　南無達摩耶　南無僧伽耶　南無毘舍浮多他竭多耶　阿羅訶提三藐三佛陀耶　唵　伽邏伽邏伽邏伽邏　拘樓拘樓拘樓拘樓　拘盧蹉陀喃　拘樓薩婆伽呵喃　娑波呵爾時毘舍浮佛說此呪已。
translated: Namo buddhāya, namo dharmāya, namo saṃghāya, namo viśvabhū tathāgatāya, arhate, samyak-saṃbuddhāya, oṃ, kalaka kalaka kalaka kalaka, kūlu kūlu kūlu kūlu, kūlucchadanam, kūlu sarva-gahakhanam, svāhā. At that time, after Buddha Viśvabhū spoke this spell,

original: 告虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩言。
analyzed: 告虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩言。
translated: He told Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Ākāśagarbha:

original: 如此神呪賢劫千佛中過去佛已說此呪。🔽現在佛今說。
analyzed: 如此神呪賢劫千佛中過去佛已說此呪。 現在佛今說。
translated: The sages of the present speak this mantra now.
The Buddhas of the future will speak it in the future.
He also said to Bodhisattva Akasagarbha:
You should uphold this mantra.
If there are sentient beings in the future world
who uphold this mantra, recite it,
or if there are people who seek out this mantra,

original: 不為刀杖怖畏一切蠱毒。
analyzed: 不為刀杖怖畏一切蠱毒。
translated: they will not be harmed by swords, sticks, or any fear, nor by any poison,
nor by any hot disease, nor by any drowning.
They will not suffer an untimely death, nor will they be afflicted by evil diseases.
All such things will be eliminated.
Only past karma will not be eliminated.

original: 若有比丘比丘尼優婆塞優婆夷。
analyzed: 若有比丘比丘尼優婆塞優婆夷。
translated: If there are bhikṣus, bhikṣuṇīs, upāsakas, or upāsikās
who rise in the morning, bathe, and wash their heads and faces,

original: 在於佛前誦此呪一百八遍。
analyzed: 在於佛前誦此呪一百八遍。
translated: and recite this mantra one hundred and eight times in front of the Buddha,
all evil will not befall their bodies.
All illnesses will naturally be cured.

original: 壽命延長一切財寶自然富足。
analyzed: 壽命延長一切財寶自然富足。
translated: One's lifespan will be extended, and all wealth and treasures will naturally be abundant.

original: 一切身中障難不善之事皆各銷除。
analyzed: 一切身中障難不善之事皆各銷除。
translated: All obstacles and unfavorable things in one's body will be eliminated.
All enemies will naturally reconcile.
All curses will not stick to one's body.

original: 澡浴誦呪因緣得如此福。
analyzed: 澡浴誦呪因緣得如此福。
translated: By the causes and conditions of bathing and reciting this mantra, one will attain such blessings.

original: 若有人於嶮難怖畏之處。
analyzed: 若有人於嶮難怖畏之處。
translated: If there are people in places of danger and fear,

original: 能憶念此呪皆得離於恐怖。
analyzed: 能憶念此呪皆得離於恐怖。
translated: they will all be able to escape from fear by recollecting this mantra.
If there are people who are in disputes,
or have disputes with the county government,
they should use white thread to make a mantra rope,

original: 呪之一百八遍繫其右臂上。
analyzed: 呪之一百八遍繫其右臂上。
translated: chant the mantra one hundred and eight times, and tie it to their right arm.
If there are people with eye pain,

original: 以桔皮結呪索繫其耳上。
analyzed: 以桔皮結呪索繫其耳上。
translated: they should use orange peel to make a mantra rope and tie it to their ears.

original: 若他方有賊欲來侵境者。
analyzed: 若他方有賊欲來侵境者。
translated: If there are thieves from other places who want to invade the territory,

original: 用酥酪蜜胡麻等分和之。
analyzed: 用酥酪蜜胡麻等分和之。
translated: they should use ghee, milk, honey, and sesame seeds in equal parts, mix them together,

original: 在佛像前用銅𨥌卷一𨥌呪之一遍擲著火中至一千八遍。
analyzed: 在佛像前用銅𨥌卷一𨥌呪之一遍擲著火中至一千八遍。
translated: and in front of a Buddha image, use a copper ladle to ladle them into the fire, chanting the mantra once for each ladle, up to one thousand and eight times.

original: 是諸怨賊無問遠近自然退散。
analyzed: 是諸怨賊無問遠近自然退散。
translated: These enemies, regardless of distance, will naturally retreat and scatter.
If there are people who wish to seek longevity,
They should use curd, honey, and fried rice as flowers.
Mix the three equally.

original: 在於佛前以銅𨥌卷之一𨥌呪之一遍擲著火中至一千八遍。
analyzed: 在於佛前以銅𨥌卷之一𨥌呪之一遍擲著火中至一千八遍。
translated: In front of the Buddha, roll them into balls with copper, and recite the mantra once, throwing them into the fire, up to 1,080 times.
Then stop.
Moreover, there are people
Who wish to do this for themselves and others.

original: 一切怖畏一切諸罪欲得除滅者欲求一切富貴財寶者。
analyzed: 一切怖畏一切諸罪欲得除滅者欲求一切富貴財寶者。
translated: Those who wish to eliminate all fears and all offenses, and seek all wealth, nobility, and treasures,

original: 欲除身中障難令得清淨者。
analyzed: 欲除身中障難令得清淨者。
translated: Those who wish to remove obstacles from the body and attain purity,
If there are people who wish to recite and uphold this mantra,

original: 一切怖畏障難悉自除滅所作成就。
analyzed: 一切怖畏障難悉自除滅所作成就。
translated: All fears and obstacles will be naturally eliminated, and their accomplishments will be fulfilled.
Moreover, those who rely on all mantra methods
Will also attain accomplishment.

original: 若有一切怨家不得其便。
analyzed: 若有一切怨家不得其便。
translated: If there are any enemies who cannot take advantage of them,
If there are people who wish to perform rituals,
They must mix medicine and apply it to the body.

original: 須茴香須稻米須那羅陀尸利沙。🔽須沈水香尸利耶欝金香。
analyzed: 須茴香須稻米須那羅陀尸利沙。 須沈水香尸利耶欝金香。
translated: Need Anise, need Rice, need Nārada Śirīṣa.🔽Need Aquilaria, need Śirīṣa, need Saffron.
Need Asarum, need Indrabāṇa.
Need Bodhi tree wood.
Such medicines are mixed in equal parts.

original: 晨朝起淨洗浴以藥塗身。
analyzed: 晨朝起淨洗浴以藥塗身。
translated: In the morning, get up, wash, and apply the medicine to the body.

original: 若復有人欲見國王大臣。
analyzed: 若復有人欲見國王大臣。
translated: If there are people who wish to see the king or ministers,
They must light a wood fire in front of the image.
Use five fingers to pinch some sesame seeds,
Recite the mantra once and throw them into the fire.
Do this 1,080 times and then stop.
If there are good men or good women,

original: 欲得一切怨家自然和解。
analyzed: 欲得一切怨家自然和解。
translated: Who wish for all their enemies to naturally reconcile,
They should wash and put on clean clothes.

original: 中夜時在於佛前以香華供養。
analyzed: 中夜時在於佛前以香華供養。
translated: At midnight, in front of the Buddha, make offerings with incense and flowers.
Use glutinous rice fried as flower petals.
Take wood and light it as a fire.
Use three fingers to pinch some of the rice flower petals.
Recite the mantra once and throw it into the fire.

original: 如此一千八遍然後乃止。
analyzed: 如此一千八遍然後乃止。
translated: Do this one thousand and eight times, then stop.
If there is a good man or good woman,

original: 夜見惡夢怨家伺求其便。
analyzed: 夜見惡夢怨家伺求其便。
translated: who sees a bad dream at night, or an enemy is looking for an opportunity to harm them,
and everything they do does not go as planned,
on the fourteenth day of the month they should not eat at all in the morning,

original: 至於日暮以香湯洗浴其身著新淨衣。
analyzed: 至於日暮以香湯洗浴其身著新淨衣。
translated: and in the evening they should wash their body with fragrant hot water and put on new clean clothes.
In front of the Buddha, recite the mantra,
according to their ability, without limiting the number.
Only stop when they have reached their limit.
They should not leave the ritual arena,
and continue to sleep in front of the image.
On the fifteenth day of the month, in the morning,

original: 即起淨洗釜著滿中淨水作湯。
analyzed: 即起淨洗釜著滿中淨水作湯。
translated: get up, wash the cauldron, and fill it with clean water to make a bath.
In the bath, they should use famous herbs and trees,

analyzed: 娑波呵爾時釋迦牟尼佛。
translated: Saparivāra Svaha At that time, Śākyamuni Buddha

original: 告虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩言。
analyzed: 告虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩言。
translated: told the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Ākāśagarbha,
If there are good men and good women

original: 受持讀誦晝夜憶念此呪者。
analyzed: 受持讀誦晝夜憶念此呪者。
translated: who uphold, recite, and remember this mantra day and night,

original: 其人不為一切刀杖等畏。
analyzed: 其人不為一切刀杖等畏。
translated: such people will not be harmed by any weapons or other dangers,
will not be afflicted by any serious illnesses,
and will not suffer any untimely death.
Just as the six buddhas mentioned above have spoken of its efficacy,

original: 我此呪者亦復如是無有異也。
analyzed: 我此呪者亦復如是無有異也。
translated: this mantra of mine is also like this, without any difference.

original: 爾無虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 爾無虛空藏菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: Then the Bodhisattva Mahāsattva Ākāśagarbha
addressed the Buddha, saying, World-Honored One,
I now wish to speak this mantra
to protect the divine mantras spoken by the seven buddhas.
Therefore, I will recite it again.
This mantra can destroy all karmic hindrances.
The mantra states:

original: 南無佛陀耶　南無達摩耶　南無僧伽耶　阿迦舍竭婆耶　菩提薩多波耶　摩訶薩多波耶　摩訶迦盧尼迦耶　多𭉐咃　支利支利　摩訶支利　兜漏兜漏　摩訶兜漏　闍婆利闍婆利　摩訶闍婆利　醯利醯利　摩訶醯利　娑波呵其呪所有功能者我今說之。
analyzed: 南無佛陀耶　南無達摩耶　南無僧伽耶　阿迦舍竭婆耶　菩提薩多波耶　摩訶薩多波耶　摩訶迦盧尼迦耶　多𭉐咃　支利支利　摩訶支利　兜漏兜漏　摩訶兜漏　闍婆利闍婆利　摩訶闍婆利　醯利醯利　摩訶醯利　娑波呵其呪所有功能者我今說之。
translated: Namo buddhāya | Namo dharmāya | Namo saṃghāya | Akāśagarbhaya | Bodhisattvāya | Mahāsattvāya | Mahākāruṇikāya | Tadyathā | Ciritri ciritri | Mahāciritri | Dūru dūru | Mahādūru | Jāvari jāvari | Mahājāvari | Hilili hilili | Mahāhilili | Svāhā | I now explain the functions of this dhāraṇī.
If a person is struck by an evil ghost,

original: 須結呪索呪之一千八遍。
analyzed: 須結呪索呪之一千八遍。
translated: they should tie a spell rope and recite it 1,080 times.

original: 用蘇曼木用酥芥子三種等分和之。
analyzed: 用蘇曼木用酥芥子三種等分和之。
translated: Use soman wood, ghee, and mustard seeds, each in equal parts, mixed together.
In front of the patient, take them with three fingers.
Recite it once and throw it into the fire.
Do this 1,080 times and stop.
That illness will then be cured.

original: 若復有人恐怖欲結界者。
analyzed: 若復有人恐怖欲結界者。
translated: If there are people who are afraid and want to set up a boundary,
One should take a knife and chant the mantra 1,080 times.
Place it at the door.

original: 若人在空中結界畏諸惡鬼求便者。
analyzed: 若人在空中結界畏諸惡鬼求便者。
translated: If someone is in the sky, fearing the evil ghosts seeking an opportunity to harm them,

original: 當取水呪之七遍用灑四方。
analyzed: 當取水呪之七遍用灑四方。
translated: Take water and chant the mantra seven times, and sprinkle it in the four directions.
If there is fear within one's own body,
Use a knotted rope to protect oneself.
If someone is poisoned,
Take old thread and grass.
Use the mantra to chant over the patient and they will be cured.
If there is someone with a wind illness,
Chant sesame oil 1,080 times.
Rub it on the afflicted area and they will be cured.
If someone has ear pain,
Take agarwood and fry it in oil.
Hold it and pour it into the ear, and they will be cured.
If someone has a stomachache,
Take crow salt and chant the mantra 108 times.
Give it to the patient to take and they will be cured.
If someone has a toothache,
Take some water with sumana flowers and chant the mantra 108 times.

original: 打碎用持刷齒即得除痛。
analyzed: 打碎用持刷齒即得除痛。
translated: If one's teeth hurt, one can use it to brush one's teeth and the pain will be relieved.

original: 若有小兒晝夜驚啼怖畏者。
analyzed: 若有小兒晝夜驚啼怖畏者。
translated: If a child cries day and night in fear,
Take white thread to make a spell rope.
Recite it one hundred and eight times.
Tie it around the child's neck and the fear will be removed.
If someone has a headache,

original: 取鑌鐵刀或用手呪之一百八遍。
analyzed: 取鑌鐵刀或用手呪之一百八遍。
translated: Take a crucible knife or use one's hand to recite it one hundred and eight times.
Rub it on the head and the pain will be relieved.
If someone is bewitched by others,
Take a crucible knife for seven days and seven nights.
Use the spell on the patient and they will be cured.
If there is thunder and lightning,
Use one's hand to pick a pomegranate branch.
Do not remove the thorns and leaves.
Hold it in one's hand and point it at the place of the sound.

original: 呪之一百八遍即得除却。
analyzed: 呪之一百八遍即得除却。
translated: Recite it one hundred and eight times and it will be removed.
For all the work one wishes to do,

original: 讀誦此呪悉用香華先供養。
analyzed: 讀誦此呪悉用香華先供養。
translated: Read and recite this spell and first make offerings with incense and flowers.
Then recite the spell and nothing will not be accomplished.
After speaking this sutra,
the bodhisattva-mahāsattva Ākāśagarbha,

original: 天龍八部一時歡喜讚歎。
analyzed: 天龍八部一時歡喜讚歎。
translated: the eight groups of spiritual beings in the heavens, all rejoiced and praised.
They single-mindedly respectfully practiced it.

original: 虛空藏菩薩問七佛陀羅尼呪經
analyzed: 虛空藏菩薩問七佛陀羅尼呪經
translated: The Sūtra of the Dhāraṇī Spells of the Seven Buddhas Asked by Bodhisattva Ākāśagarbha
